author: mcslee
msg: Summary: PHP is undebatably the worst programming language in the world. Class names are case insensitive, so new $tHiNg = new $THing. Garbase. Now autoload has to deal with the fallout.
Test Plan: autoload enabled falcon code

author: mcslee
msg: Kill fast binary compliance in TBase, it doesn't work

author: mcslee
msg: Complete the proper handling of all special characters in JSON strings for TJSONProtocol

author: mcslee
msg: Make inheriting from TBase and using inherited read method optional in generated Thrift PHP code
Test Plan: Generate falcon etc. without -phpo and check it out

author: mcslee
msg: Create a TServerEventHandler interface in TServer
Summary: Such that users can supply an event handler to a server that will be used to signal various events that take place inside the server core.
Test Plan: Rebuilt all servers, work by default
Other Notes: Partially submitted and also reviewed by Dave Simpson at Powerset
